name: Breathwork and Meditation
description: Techniques for calming the mind and improving focus through controlled breathing and meditation.

cards.title: Box Breathing for Focus and Stress Reduction
cards.description: A structured breathing technique to regulate stress and improve concentration.
bulletpoints: Inhale for 4 seconds, hold for 4 seconds, exhale for 4 seconds, and hold again
Repeat for 5-10 minutes to enhance relaxation
Use during stressful situations to regain composure

cards.title: Body Scan Meditation for Relaxation
cards.description: A guided meditation practice focusing on different body parts to release tension.
bulletpoints: Start at the feet and mentally scan upward to the head
Acknowledge and release any tension found
Maintain slow, deep breaths throughout the session
